name: RenderObjectToWidgetAdapter
desc: A bridge from a [RenderObject] to an [Element] tree.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: container
fields.desc: The [RenderObject] that is the parent of the [Element] created by this widget.

fields.name: debugShortDescription
fields.desc: A short description of this widget used by debugging aids.
